game.alsoFor: BBC Micro, ZX Spectrum | Combined View
game.description: Planetfall is sci-fi business trading game. The players (game hasn't single player mode) command merchant Starfleet - they can travel between the different planetary systems (with changing business conditions), buy and sell various resources (6 - Uranium, Iron Ore, Machinery, Medical supplies, Computers and Gems), make money and collect them in banks. A game can have a maximum of 15 star-systems.
game.name: Planetfall
